### If $\mathscr{A}$ is the $\sigma$-algebra generated by a measurable partition of $\Omega, B_1, B_2, \dots, B_n$ such that $\mathbb{P}(B_i)>0$, $i = 1, 2, \dots, n$ and if $X \in L_1(\Omega, \mathscr{F}, \mathbb{P})$ find $Y = \mathbb{E}[X|\mathscr{A}]$.
